gpu: X.Org Radeon RX 580 Series (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.5-90.current, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: No glitches or bugs noticed. Frame rate was only 25-30 maxed out but was only 40 FPS on Windows.
title: The Town of Light

notes:
I had the game maxed out at a stable 25-35 fps but if you check the official system requirements I should be getting 60fps (even with the overhead applied) but the game is not well optimized at all or should I say, Unity games in general or just Proton doesn't like them. 

I also had extremely weird performance anomalies. Even though my fps was nowhere near where I should see stuttering, it "stuttered" while moving, it didn't matter if I was on the lowest or highest settings and remained the same weird phenomenon. I also had sequences where my fps suddenly tanked into single digits and I had to lower the settings just to get through, the worst offender was the 13th chapter with this. Outside of the "dream/flashback" sequences the performance remained consistent enough. Despite this I was able to finish the game nonetheless.
title: The Town of Light
